Virginia_Beach.Cape Henry Collegiate School:
Cape Henry Collegiate (formerly Cape Henry Collegiate School, also known as Cape Henry or CHCS) is an independent coeducational school in Virginia Beach, Virginia.


== History ==
CHC was founded in 1924 by Helena Everett as the Everett School. In the 1960s, the population of Virginia Beach was expanding rapidly as larger and larger numbers of people were "seeking the suburban lifestyle." In 1971, Arthur and Miriam Peregoff purchased the original Everett School and changed its name to Cape Henry Collegiate School.
